name: One Way Trip
description:
One Way Trip is an adventure game that takes you on a wildly surreal journey through a trippy sci-fi future full of bright colors and dark secrets. When a mass poisoning leaves much of the nation with only six hours left to live, during which time they will be hallucinating constantly, you and your brother must decide how to spend them, and whether or not to hunt for a cure! What will happen next? That all depends on your choices…

1 player
DUALSHOCK®4

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).
